Posted By: Rouser (5/18/2013 10:13:46 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Loren That has been a problem for me with this block, each guild has decent art and flavor, but within the guild the art across cards is quite interchangeable. Every Gruul card looks like it is happening during a forest fire and each Golgari card looks like a 90s grunge music video.  
  
This card, once you do recognize it, is a Limited bomb. It does what pyreheart wolf and madcap skills did before it, grants an evasive ability that is somehow usually underrated. If you have five 2/2s, 15 damage is coming through and your opponent needs 10 creatures. The +1/+0 is subtle, but powerful. It shortens the clock significantly and allows you to trade up. Advantage is gained so marginally in this format that trading a 4/4 with your 3/3, two creatures for one with deathtouch and eliminating a single blocker the turn it comes down are huge. I have had success with Naya and Jund builds so far, I haven't lost when this has hit the table.
posts.html:

Advantage is gained so marginally in this format that trading a 4/4 with your 3/3, two creatures for one with deathtouch and eliminating a single blocker the turn it comes down are huge.
